there is a much easer and non-destructive way to do this. all you need is winRAR. click on the game you wish to have in winRAR(make sure you havnt imported it into iTunes yet.) and navigate to iTunesMetaData or iPodMetaData. there will only be 1 there. right click it and click extract to folder. extract it to a folder and then navigate to it with windows. open it up with notepad. it may be easier if word wrapping is turned on. find the email address in there and change it to the one that you use for your iTunes account. save and close notepad. drag and drop the file in winRAR(make sure that you are still in the game you want) and click OK to copy and replace the old file. enjoy! just open it in iTunes  and it will ask for the password for the account of the email address you typed in! thats it!

The 5g ipod's serial number's last three digits will be one of the following: V9K, V9P, V9M, V9R, V9L, V9N, V9Q, V9S, WU9, WUA, WUB, WUC, and X3N. The 5.5g U2 Special Edition iPod (30 GB Late 2006) serial number's last three digits are W9G.
